step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
Nicely done raising your hands towards your forehead. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Great hold! You maintained good form throughout the 30 seconds.
Smooth reversal. Returning to the start position looks good.
Second rep starting strong! Ensure your hands remain clasped as you bring them towards your forehead.
Good movement here. Focus on keeping those elbows close as you raise your hands.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head. Remember to keep your head steady and avoid leaning forward.
Well done holding this position. Your form is consistent.
Great job returning to the starting position. You completed the exercise well.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows close when raising your hands and spreading them wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright throughout the movement.
